data.content:
Pyke (Empyrean Pyke)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: June 27, 2019

Empyrean Pyke is a skin for the champion Pyke in the popular online game League of Legends. Released on June 27, 2019, this skin offers players a visually stunning and thematically unique experience. Priced at 1350 RP, Empyrean Pyke is a high-quality skin that brings a fresh look to the champion.

The Empyrean Pyke skin transforms the champion into a celestial assassin, adorned with ethereal armor and wielding a mystical harpoon. The skin features a vibrant color palette, with shades of blue and gold dominating the design. The celestial theme is further emphasized by the inclusion of glowing particles and effects, giving Pyke an otherworldly appearance.

One of the standout features of Empyrean Pyke is the unique recall animation. When Pyke recalls, he is lifted into the air by a swirling vortex of energy, creating a visually striking moment. This recall animation adds an extra layer of immersion to the skin, making it a delight to use in-game.

Pyke, the champion behind the Empyrean Pyke skin, is a formidable assassin known for his ability to swiftly eliminate enemies and disappear into the shadows. His kit revolves around stealth, mobility, and crowd control, making him a versatile pick in the game.

Pyke's strengths lie in his ability to catch opponents off guard and quickly burst them down. His Q ability, Bone Skewer, allows him to hook enemies and stun them, setting up kills for himself and his team. His W ability, Ghostwater Dive, grants him invisibility and a significant movement speed boost, enabling him to engage or disengage fights with ease.

Furthermore, Pyke's ultimate ability, Death from Below, is a powerful execute that deals massive damage to low-health enemies. This ability resets upon securing a kill, allowing Pyke to chain together multiple eliminations in team fights. His passive ability, Gift of the Drowned Ones, also provides him with bonus health regeneration and gold when he assists in killing enemies.

However, Pyke does have weaknesses that players must be mindful of. He is relatively squishy and lacks sustained damage, making him vulnerable in extended fights against tankier opponents. Additionally, his abilities have high cooldowns, requiring careful management to maximize his effectiveness in skirmishes and team fights.

In the lore of League of Legends, Pyke has a dark and tragic past. Once a feared and ruthless harpooner named Drowned Captain, Pyke met his demise at the hands of his crewmates, who left him to drown in the depths of the ocean. However, he was resurrected by the mysterious entity known as the Black Mist, transforming him into an undead revenant seeking revenge on those who wronged him.

Pyke's story is one of vengeance and retribution. He prowls the waters of Bilgewater, hunting down his former crewmates and anyone else who crosses his path. With his newfound abilities and insatiable thirst for revenge, Pyke has become a feared figure in the criminal underworld of the city.

Empyrean Pyke is just one of the many skins available for Pyke in League of Legends. Players can explore a variety of different appearances for the champion, each offering a unique visual and thematic experience. Whether it's the haunting Blood Moon Pyke, the futuristic PROJECT: Pyke, or the menacing Sand Wraith Pyke, there is a skin to suit every player's taste.

For more information about Pyke and his various skins, including videos showcasing their visual effects and animations, be sure to visit this page. Discover the different facets of this intriguing champion and find the perfect skin to unleash your own brand of vengeance on the Rift.

Pyke (PROJECT: Pyke)

RP Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: August 2, 2018

PROJECT: Pyke is a futuristic and cybernetic skin for the champion Pyke in the popular online game League of Legends. This skin was released on August 2, 2018, and is available for purchase in the in-game store for 1350 RP. With its sleek and high-tech design, PROJECT: Pyke offers players a visually stunning and immersive experience.

The PROJECT universe in League of Legends is a dystopian future where champions are transformed into cybernetic beings. Pyke, the Bloodharbor Ripper, is no exception to this transformation. In this alternate reality, Pyke becomes a ruthless assassin equipped with advanced technology and a deadly arsenal.

PROJECT: Pyke features a complete visual overhaul for the champion. His appearance is enhanced with cybernetic enhancements, glowing neon lights, and a sleek black and silver color scheme. His signature harpoon has been replaced with a futuristic energy blade, and his abilities have been reimagined to fit the PROJECT theme.

One of the standout features of PROJECT: Pyke is his recall animation. When Pyke recalls, he activates a holographic projection of himself, creating a decoy to confuse his enemies. This animation not only adds a unique touch to the skin but also showcases Pyke's cunning and deceptive nature.

Pyke, the champion behind the PROJECT: Pyke skin, has an intriguing backstory within the League of Legends lore. Formerly known as Drowned Captain Pyke, he was a sailor who met a tragic end at the hands of his crewmates. However, he was resurrected by the mysterious entity known as the Black Mist, granting him a second chance at life.

Now driven by revenge, Pyke roams the seas as a vengeful specter, hunting down those who wronged him. His abilities reflect his thirst for vengeance, allowing him to sneak up on unsuspecting enemies, stun them with his ghostly presence, and execute them with his deadly harpoon.

In the game, Pyke is classified as an assassin support, making him a unique and versatile champion. His abilities allow him to engage in fights, deal significant damage, and provide utility to his team. His passive ability, Gift of the Drowned Ones, allows him to regenerate health when he is unseen by enemies, making him a formidable opponent in the right hands.

Pyke's strengths lie in his ability to catch enemies off guard and quickly eliminate them. His Q ability, Bone Skewer, allows him to hook enemies and stun them, setting up kills for himself and his teammates. His ultimate ability, Death from Below, is a powerful execution move that resets upon killing an enemy champion, allowing Pyke to chain together multiple kills in team fights.

However, Pyke also has weaknesses that players need to be aware of. He is relatively squishy and lacks sustained damage compared to other assassins. Additionally, his abilities require precise timing and positioning to maximize their effectiveness. Pyke players need to be strategic and patient, waiting for the right moment to strike and secure kills.

Overall, Pyke is a unique and exciting champion in the League of Legends roster. His PROJECT: Pyke skin adds an extra layer of visual appeal and immersion to his gameplay. Whether you're a fan of the PROJECT universe or simply enjoy playing as a deadly assassin, PROJECT: Pyke is a skin worth considering.

On this page, you can find more information about Pyke, his abilities, and his other available skins. You can also watch videos showcasing his appearances and gameplay. Dive into the world of Pyke and experience the thrill of being the Bloodharbor Ripper in the League of Legends universe.

Pyke: The Bloodharbor Ripper

Release Date: May 31, 2018

Pyke, also known as The Bloodharbor Ripper, is a menacing and mysterious champion in the popular online game League of Legends. With his unique abilities and dark backstory, Pyke has become a favorite among players who enjoy playing aggressive and high-risk champions. In this article, we will delve into Pyke's story, his strengths and weaknesses, his background in the game, and his place in the League of Legends universe.

The Story of Pyke

Pyke's tale begins in the dark and treacherous waters of Bilgewater, a notorious port city known for its lawlessness and cutthroat nature. Once a humble fisherman named Pyke, he met a gruesome fate at the hands of his crewmates who betrayed him, leaving him to drown in the depths of the ocean. However, instead of finding peace in death, Pyke was granted a twisted form of immortality by the vengeful spirit of the deep sea.

Now reborn as a revenant, Pyke seeks revenge on those who wronged him, lurking in the shadows and striking fear into the hearts of his enemies. He prowls the streets of Bilgewater, hunting down his former crewmates one by one, leaving a trail of blood and terror in his wake. Pyke's haunting presence and relentless pursuit make him a truly fearsome champion to face on the Rift.

Strengths and Weaknesses

Pyke's unique skill set allows him to excel in certain areas while also presenting some weaknesses that players must be mindful of. Understanding his strengths and weaknesses is crucial for both playing as Pyke and playing against him.

One of Pyke's greatest strengths lies in his ability to quickly eliminate squishy targets. His Q ability, Bone Skewer, allows him to hook enemies and pull them towards him, setting up opportunities for his team to secure kills. Additionally, his E ability, Phantom Undertow, allows him to dash through enemies, stunning them and creating openings for his team to engage. Pyke's ultimate ability, Death from Below, is a powerful execute that deals massive damage to enemies below a certain health threshold, making him a formidable assassin.

Furthermore, Pyke possesses a unique passive ability called Gift of the Drowned Ones. This ability grants him bonus health regeneration based on his missing health, allowing him to sustain in fights and stay on the battlefield longer. This passive, combined with his high mobility and crowd control, makes Pyke a formidable force in team fights and skirmishes.

However, Pyke does have weaknesses that can be exploited by skilled opponents. One of his main weaknesses is his squishiness. Pyke has low base health and armor, making him vulnerable to burst damage and focused attacks. Additionally, his abilities have relatively high cooldowns, leaving him vulnerable during the downtime between casts. Pyke players must be cautious and strategic in their engagements, as mistimed abilities or poor positioning can quickly lead to their demise.

Pyke's Background in the Game

Pyke was introduced to League of Legends on May 31, 2018, as a support assassin champion. His unique playstyle and lore instantly captivated players, and he quickly became a popular pick in both casual and professional play. Pyke's ability to roam and make plays across the map, coupled with his high burst damage, made him a favorite among aggressive support players.

Pyke's kit allows him to excel in the support role while also providing opportunities for him to carry games. His ability to secure kills and share gold with his teammates through his passive ability, Gift of the Drowned Ones, makes him a valuable asset in the bot lane. Pyke's presence in team fights can turn the tide of battle, as his crowd control and execute potential can quickly eliminate key targets and swing the advantage in his team's favor.

Furthermore, Pyke's unique playstyle and lore have inspired the creation of various skins that further enhance his visual appeal and thematic presence. Players can access information and videos of all Pyke skins on this page, allowing them to explore the different aesthetics and visual effects that each skin offers.

Pyke's Place in the Game

Pyke's introduction to League of Legends brought a fresh and exciting playstyle to the support role. With his assassin-like abilities and high-risk, high-reward gameplay, Pyke offers a unique experience for players who enjoy aggressive and impactful champions.

Pyke's place in the game extends beyond his role as a support champion. His lore and thematic presence have made him a beloved character in the League of Legends universe. The haunting tale of Pyke's revenge and his relentless pursuit of justice resonates with players, adding depth and intrigue to the game's lore.

Whether you're a support main looking for a thrilling and impactful champion or a lore enthusiast intrigued by Pyke's dark backstory, Pyke is a champion worth exploring. With his unique abilities, strengths, and weaknesses, Pyke offers a dynamic and engaging gameplay experience that is sure to keep players on the edge of their seats.

Visit our page to access information and videos of all Pyke skins, allowing you to immerse yourself in the visual splendor of this menacing champion.

Pyke (Sentinel Pyke)

Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: June 3, 2021

Pyke, the Bloodharbor Ripper, is known for his ruthless and deadly nature. With his unique abilities and haunting appearance, he strikes fear into the hearts of his enemies. However, there is a side to Pyke that few have seen - a side that fights for justice and protects the innocent. This is where Sentinel Pyke comes into play.

Sentinel Pyke is a skin that showcases Pyke's transformation into a member of the Sentinel faction, a group of champions dedicated to defending the world from evil. This skin not only changes Pyke's appearance but also adds new visual and sound effects to his abilities, making him even more menacing on the battlefield.

With Sentinel Pyke, Pyke dons a sleek and stylish armor adorned with the iconic Sentinel emblem. His once blood-soaked blades are now replaced with glowing blue energy, signifying his allegiance to the Sentinel cause. The skin also features new animations, including a unique recall animation where Pyke disappears into a portal, leaving behind a trail of blue energy.

One of the standout features of Sentinel Pyke is the new voiceover. Pyke's voice takes on a more heroic tone, reflecting his newfound dedication to protecting the innocent. His quotes are filled with determination and a sense of justice, further enhancing the immersive experience of playing as Sentinel Pyke.

As for Pyke's abilities, they receive a complete visual overhaul with the Sentinel Pyke skin. His Q ability, Bone Skewer, now emits a blue energy trail as it travels towards its target. The E ability, Phantom Undertow, leaves behind a trail of blue energy as Pyke dashes through enemies. And his ultimate, Death from Below, features a stunning visual effect that showcases Pyke's power as a Sentinel.

Now, let's delve into the story of Pyke and how he became a member of the Sentinel faction. Pyke was once a feared and ruthless killer in the streets of Bilgewater. He was betrayed and left for dead by his crewmates, only to be saved by the mysterious Black Mist. The Black Mist granted Pyke a second chance at life, but with a curse - he would forever thirst for the blood of those who wronged him.

However, Pyke's encounter with the Sentinels changed everything. The Sentinels, led by Lucian and Senna, fight against the Black Mist and its corrupting influence. They saw potential in Pyke and offered him a chance to redeem himself by joining their cause. Pyke, driven by his desire for revenge and a newfound sense of justice, accepted their offer and became a member of the Sentinel faction.

Pyke's strengths lie in his ability to quickly eliminate squishy targets and snowball the game in his team's favor. His Q ability, Bone Skewer, allows him to hook enemies and set up kills for his team. His E ability, Phantom Undertow, provides him with mobility and crowd control, making it easier for him to engage or disengage fights. And his ultimate, Death from Below, allows him to execute low-health enemies and reset his abilities, giving him the potential to turn fights around.

However, Pyke also has weaknesses that players must be aware of. He is relatively squishy and lacks sustained damage, making him vulnerable in extended fights. Additionally, his abilities require precise timing and positioning to maximize their effectiveness. Pyke players must have good game sense and map awareness to roam and make impactful plays around the map.

In the world of League of Legends, Pyke is a champion who thrives in the support role. His unique playstyle and high-risk, high-reward gameplay make him a favorite among players who enjoy making flashy plays and turning the tides of battle. With his Sentinel Pyke skin, players can now experience a new side of Pyke and join the ranks of the Sentinels in their fight against the forces of darkness.

For more information about Pyke and his various appearances, including the Sentinel Pyke skin, you can visit the official League of Legends website or watch videos on the League of Legends YouTube channel. Embrace the darkness and unleash your inner Bloodharbor Ripper with Sentinel Pyke!

Pyke (Default)

RP Cost: N/A

Release Date: N/A

Pyke, the Bloodharbor Ripper, is a menacing champion in the popular online game League of Legends. Known for his ruthless nature and thirst for revenge, Pyke is a formidable force on the Summoner's Rift. In this article, we will delve into the story behind Pyke's default costume and explore all the intricate details of his appearance.

The Story Behind Pyke's Default Costume

Pyke's default costume embodies his dark and mysterious persona. Dressed in tattered rags and adorned with gruesome accessories, Pyke strikes fear into the hearts of his enemies. His attire reflects his tragic past and his transformation into a vengeful specter haunting the waters of Bilgewater.

The Bloodharbor Ripper was once a humble fisherman named Pyke. He lived a simple life, providing for his family and enjoying the tranquility of the sea. However, his life took a tragic turn when he was betrayed by his crewmates. Left for dead in the depths of the ocean, Pyke was consumed by anger and a burning desire for revenge.

Emerging from the depths as an undead revenant, Pyke now prowls the streets of Bilgewater, seeking out those who wronged him. His default costume reflects his transformation, with tattered clothing and a haunting mask that conceals his true identity. The bloodstains on his outfit serve as a constant reminder of the lives he has taken in his quest for vengeance.

The attention to detail in Pyke's default costume is remarkable. From the intricately designed mask to the weathered texture of his clothing, every aspect of his appearance adds to his menacing presence. The developers at Riot Games have truly captured the essence of Pyke's character through his default costume, making him a visually striking champion in the game.

Pyke's Strengths and Weaknesses

Pyke is a unique champion with a set of strengths and weaknesses that make him a formidable opponent in the game. Understanding these attributes is crucial for both playing as Pyke and playing against him.

One of Pyke's greatest strengths is his ability to quickly eliminate squishy targets. His ultimate ability,

allows him to execute low-health enemies, regardless of their current health. This makes him a deadly assassin who can swiftly turn the tide of team fights. Additionally, Pyke's mobility and crowd control abilities make him a slippery champion to catch, allowing him to escape dangerous situations or engage in favorable skirmishes.

However, Pyke also has his fair share of weaknesses. His low base health and lack of sustain make him vulnerable to burst damage and poke champions. Additionally, Pyke heavily relies on landing skill shots to maximize his damage output. Missing these abilities can significantly hinder his effectiveness in fights. Furthermore, Pyke's ultimate ability has a long cooldown, requiring careful timing and decision-making to make the most of its execution potential.

Despite these weaknesses, Pyke's strengths make him a popular pick in both professional and casual play. His unique playstyle and high-risk, high-reward gameplay make him an exciting champion to master.

Pyke's Place in the Game

Pyke's introduction to League of Legends brought a fresh and innovative playstyle to the game. As a support champion with an assassin-like kit, Pyke offers a unique approach to the support role. His ability to roam and make plays across the map sets him apart from traditional support champions.

In the bot lane, Pyke's presence can be intimidating for the enemy team. His ability to engage, disengage, and provide utility to his ADC makes him a versatile pick. Pyke's ultimate ability also allows him to share gold with his teammates, making him a valuable asset for snowballing the game and securing objectives.

Outside of the bot lane, Pyke can also be played in other roles such as mid or top lane. His high burst damage and mobility make him a viable choice for players looking to dominate their opponents in solo lanes. However, it's important to note that Pyke's effectiveness in these roles may vary depending on the team composition and the skill of the player.

Explore Pyke's Appearances

If you're interested in learning more about Pyke's various appearances and skins, you can find detailed information and videos on our dedicated page. From the haunting
costume to the flashy

skin, each appearance offers a unique visual experience that enhances your gameplay.

Whether you're a fan of Pyke's lore, his gameplay mechanics, or simply enjoy his menacing presence on the Rift, exploring his appearances will surely deepen your appreciation for this captivating champion.

In conclusion, Pyke's default costume is a visual representation of his tragic past and his relentless pursuit of vengeance. The attention to detail in his appearance, coupled with his unique gameplay mechanics, makes him a standout champion in League of Legends. Whether you choose to play as Pyke or face him on the battlefield, his menacing presence is sure to leave a lasting impression.

Pyke (Soul Fighter Pyke)

RP: 1350 | Release Date: June 6, 2019

Pyke, the Bloodharbor Ripper, is known for his ruthless and deadly nature. With his eerie appearance and haunting abilities, he strikes fear into the hearts of his enemies. However, there is a side to Pyke that few have seen - a side that embraces the darkness within him. This is where the Soul Fighter Pyke skin comes into play.

Soul Fighter Pyke is a skin that delves deeper into Pyke's connection with the souls of his victims. It transforms him into a spectral warrior, ready to unleash his vengeance upon the Summoner's Rift. The skin features a unique color palette, with shades of blue and purple dominating his appearance. His armor is adorned with ethereal patterns, giving him an otherworldly aura.

One of the standout features of the Soul Fighter Pyke skin is his weapon. Instead of his usual bone saw, Pyke wields a spectral scythe. The scythe glows with an eerie light, and its design perfectly complements Pyke's spectral theme. As he slashes through his enemies, the scythe leaves behind a trail of ghostly energy, adding to the skin's overall aesthetic.

In addition to his weapon, Pyke's abilities also receive a visual overhaul with the Soul Fighter Pyke skin. His Q ability, Bone Skewer, now emits a ghostly trail as it travels through the air. When it hits an enemy, the impact creates a burst of spectral energy. His W ability, Ghostwater Dive, transforms him into a ghostly apparition, leaving behind a trail of ethereal mist. The E ability, Phantom Undertow, sends out spectral chains that latch onto enemies, pulling them towards Pyke. Finally, his ultimate ability, Death from Below, unleashes a wave of ghostly energy that deals massive damage to enemies in its path.

Now that we've explored the details of the Soul Fighter Pyke skin, let's take a moment to delve into Pyke's story and his place in the League of Legends universe.

Pyke was once a humble fisherman named Pyke Maelstrom, living in the port city of Bilgewater. However, his life took a dark turn when he was betrayed by his crewmates and left for dead at the bottom of the ocean. Miraculously, Pyke did not die. Instead, he was transformed by the creatures of the deep, becoming a vengeful revenant.

Now known as the Bloodharbor Ripper, Pyke prowls the streets of Bilgewater, seeking revenge on those who wronged him. He hunts down his former crewmates, using his spectral abilities to strike fear into their hearts. Pyke's ultimate goal is to cleanse Bilgewater of its corruption, one kill at a time.

In the game, Pyke is a support champion with a unique playstyle. His abilities allow him to engage in fights, deal damage, and execute low-health enemies. His passive ability, Gift of the Drowned Ones, allows him to regenerate health when he is unseen by enemies. This makes him a formidable opponent, as he can quickly heal up and re-engage in fights.

Pyke's strengths lie in his ability to catch enemies off guard and quickly burst them down. His Q ability, Bone Skewer, is a skillshot that can hook enemies and stun them, setting up kills for his team. His E ability, Phantom Undertow, allows him to dash through enemies, damaging and slowing them. Finally, his ultimate ability, Death from Below, allows him to execute enemies below a certain threshold of health, resetting the ability if he successfully eliminates a target.

However, Pyke also has weaknesses that players must be aware of. He is relatively squishy and lacks sustained damage. His abilities have high cooldowns, making him vulnerable during their downtime. Additionally, Pyke relies heavily on snowballing and securing kills to be effective. If he falls behind, he can struggle to have an impact on the game.

Overall, Pyke is a unique and exciting champion to play. His dark backstory and haunting appearance make him a fan-favorite among League of Legends players. Whether you're looking to unleash your vengeance as the Bloodharbor Ripper or explore his spectral side with the Soul Fighter Pyke skin, Pyke offers a thrilling and rewarding gameplay experience.

For more information about Pyke and his various appearances, including the Soul Fighter Pyke skin, be sure to check out the official League of Legends website and watch the champion spotlight videos. Dive into the depths of Bilgewater and embrace the darkness within as you command Pyke on the Summoner's Rift.

Pyke (PsyOps Pyke)

RP Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: September 3, 2020

Pyke, the Bloodharbor Ripper, is known for his ruthless nature and deadly skills as an assassin in the game League of Legends. With the release of the

skin, players can now experience a whole new level of darkness and mystery surrounding this already menacing champion.

The

skin takes Pyke's appearance to a whole new level, transforming him into a cybernetic assassin. This skin features a futuristic design with glowing neon accents, giving Pyke a more high-tech and sinister look. His signature harpoon has been replaced with a cybernetic arm, and his mask now features a glowing visor, adding to the overall futuristic aesthetic.

One of the standout features of the

skin is the unique visual effects and animations. Pyke's abilities have been reimagined to fit the cybernetic theme, with neon lights and holographic projections accompanying his every move. From his Q ability, Bone Skewer, to his ultimate, Death from Below, each ability showcases the technological prowess of this skin.

In addition to the visual enhancements, the

skin also includes new sound effects and voice lines. Pyke's voice has been altered to sound more robotic and distorted, further emphasizing the cybernetic nature of this skin. The sound effects for his abilities have also been modified to match the futuristic theme, creating a truly immersive experience for players.

Now, let's delve into the story of Pyke and his place in the game. Pyke was once a feared harpooner in the slaughter docks of Bilgewater. Betrayed and left for dead by his crewmates, he was consumed by the depths of the ocean, only to return as a vengeful revenant. Pyke seeks revenge on those who wronged him, using his newfound abilities to hunt down and eliminate his targets.

Pyke's strengths lie in his ability to quickly assassinate enemies and escape with his E ability, Phantom Undertow. His passive ability, Gift of the Drowned Ones, allows him to regenerate health when he is unseen by enemies, making him a formidable opponent in skirmishes and team fights. Pyke's ultimate, Death from Below, is a powerful execute ability that can turn the tide of a battle when used strategically.

However, Pyke also has weaknesses that players must be aware of. He is relatively squishy and lacks sustained damage, making him vulnerable in extended fights. Pyke heavily relies on landing his skill shots to maximize his damage output, so players with good reflexes and mobility can easily dodge his abilities and render him less effective.

In the game, Pyke is primarily played as a support champion due to his ability to set up kills for his ADC (Attack Damage Carry) and roam around the map to assist other lanes. His crowd control abilities, such as his E ability and ultimate, make him a valuable asset in team fights and skirmishes. Pyke's playstyle revolves around making picks and catching enemies off guard, utilizing his stealth and burst damage to secure kills.

On this page, you can find information and videos showcasing all the appearances of Pyke, including the
skin. Whether you're a fan of his original look or want to explore the darker side of Pyke with the
skin, there's something for everyone to enjoy.

Pyke (Sand Wraith Pyke)

Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: June 28, 2018

Pyke, the Bloodharbor Ripper, is a champion in the popular online game League of Legends. Known for his ruthless nature and thirst for revenge, Pyke has become a fan-favorite due to his unique playstyle and intriguing backstory. One of the many skins available for Pyke is the

skin, which offers players a visually stunning and thematically fitting alternative appearance for the champion.

The Story of Sand Wraith Pyke

The Sand Wraith Pyke skin takes the champion's already menacing appearance to a whole new level. Dressed in tattered desert garb, Pyke becomes a fearsome figure of the desert, ready to strike fear into the hearts of his enemies. The skin features a color palette dominated by sandy tones, with hints of red and gold, perfectly capturing the essence of the unforgiving desert.

Pyke's signature harpoon has been transformed into a wicked-looking scimitar, adorned with intricate carvings and symbols. The blade glows with an otherworldly energy, adding an extra layer of mystique to the skin. His abilities also receive a visual overhaul, with sand and dust effects replacing the usual water-themed visuals. The ultimate ability,

showcases Pyke emerging from the sand, striking fear into his foes as he executes them with ruthless precision.

Overall, the Sand Wraith Pyke skin offers players a visually stunning and thematically fitting alternative appearance for the champion. Whether you're a fan of Pyke's lore or simply enjoy playing the champion, this skin is a must-have for any dedicated Pyke player.

Pyke: The Bloodharbor Ripper

Pyke's story within the League of Legends universe is a tragic one. Once a humble fisherman named Pyke Mainsail, he met his untimely demise at the hands of the notorious gang known as the Bloodharbor Ripper. However, instead of finding peace in death, Pyke was resurrected by the vengeful spirit of the deep sea, seeking retribution against those who wronged him.

As a champion, Pyke excels in the role of a support assassin. His unique abilities allow him to swiftly eliminate enemies while providing utility to his team. His passive ability,

grants him bonus movement speed and the ability to regenerate health when he is unseen by enemies. This ability synergizes well with his other skills, allowing him to quickly engage and disengage from fights.

Pyke's Q ability,
allows him to throw his harpoon, damaging and stunning the first enemy hit. This ability can be used to initiate fights or catch out enemies who are out of position. His W ability,

turns Pyke invisible and grants him a significant movement speed boost. This ability is perfect for setting up surprise attacks or escaping dangerous situations.

Pyke's E ability,
sends out a ghostly wave that damages and slows enemies. This ability can be used to poke enemies or initiate team fights. Finally, Pyke's ultimate ability,

allows him to execute low-health enemies, resetting the ability's cooldown and granting additional gold to his teammates. This ability is what makes Pyke a true threat on the battlefield, as it can quickly turn the tide of a fight in his team's favor.

In the world of League of Legends, Pyke has become a popular pick in both professional and casual play. His unique playstyle and high burst damage make him a formidable opponent in the hands of skilled players. Whether you're looking to dominate the bot lane or make game-changing plays in team fights, Pyke is a champion that should not be underestimated.

Explore Pyke's Appearances

If you're interested in learning more about Pyke and his various appearances, you can find more information and videos on our dedicated page. From his base skin to the Sand Wraith Pyke skin and beyond, you'll discover the many ways you can customize and enhance your gameplay experience with this captivating champion.

So, what are you waiting for? Dive into the world of Pyke and unleash your inner Bloodharbor Ripper!

Pyke (Prestige Soul Fighter Pyke)

RP Cost: 100 Prestige Points | Release Date: June 2019

League of Legends is known for its vast array of champions, each with their own unique abilities and captivating stories. One such champion is Pyke, a fearsome assassin who stalks the depths of the sea. Pyke's latest skin,

offers players a stunning new look for this deadly champion.

The Prestige Soul Fighter Pyke skin was released in June 2019 and can be obtained by spending 100 Prestige Points. This exclusive skin is a testament to Pyke's prowess as a merciless killer, featuring intricate details and a striking color palette that sets it apart from his other appearances.

As players equip the Prestige Soul Fighter Pyke skin, they will notice the transformation of Pyke's appearance. His usual dark and tattered attire is replaced with a more refined and regal outfit, adorned with golden accents and intricate patterns. The skin also introduces new visual effects, such as shimmering golden trails that follow Pyke's movements, adding an extra layer of elegance to his deadly strikes.

One of the most notable aspects of the Prestige Soul Fighter Pyke skin is the inclusion of unique sound effects. As Pyke unleashes his abilities, players will hear the distinct sound of clashing swords and the haunting echoes of the deep sea. These audio enhancements further immerse players in the world of Pyke, making each kill feel even more satisfying.

Pyke, the Bloodharbor Ripper, has a captivating backstory that adds depth to his character. Once a humble fisherman named Pyke Mainsail, he met a tragic end at the hands of his greedy crewmates. Instead of finding peace in death, Pyke was resurrected by the vengeful spirit of the drowned, transforming him into an undead assassin.

With his newfound abilities, Pyke seeks revenge on those who wronged him, lurking in the shadows and striking fear into the hearts of his enemies. His unique playstyle revolves around his ability to swiftly eliminate targets and escape unscathed, making him a formidable force on the battlefield.

Pyke's strengths lie in his high burst damage and mobility. His Q ability, Bone Skewer, allows him to hook enemies and pull them towards him, setting up devastating combos. His E ability, Phantom Undertow, grants him increased movement speed and the ability to dash through enemies, making it easier for him to engage or disengage from fights. Additionally, his ultimate ability, Death from Below, allows him to execute low-health enemies and reset its cooldown if the kill is successful, enabling him to chain multiple executions in team fights.

However, Pyke also has weaknesses that players must be mindful of. He is relatively squishy and lacks sustained damage, making him vulnerable in prolonged engagements. Additionally, his abilities consume a significant amount of mana, requiring careful resource management to avoid running out during crucial moments.

In the world of League of Legends, Pyke has found his place as a fearsome assassin and a popular pick in both professional and casual play. His unique playstyle and captivating lore have made him a fan-favorite among players, and the Prestige Soul Fighter Pyke skin offers a visually stunning way to showcase his deadly skills.

On this page, you can find information and videos showcasing all of Pyke's appearances, including the Prestige Soul Fighter Pyke skin. Whether you're a fan of Pyke's lore or simply enjoy playing him on the Rift, this page is a treasure trove of content dedicated to this enigmatic champion.

costume, which adds a dark and mysterious twist to his already menacing appearance.

Details of the Costume

The

Pyke's Story

Pyke's story is one of tragedy and revenge. Once a humble fisherman named Pyke Mainsail, he met his untimely demise at the hands of the notorious pirate gang, the Bloodharbor Ripper's Crew. However, instead of finding peace in death, Pyke was resurrected by the vengeful spirit of the deep sea. Now driven by a thirst for revenge, Pyke prowls the waters of Bilgewater, hunting down those who wronged him.

In the game, Pyke is classified as an assassin support champion. His unique abilities allow him to excel in the bottom lane, where he can surprise enemies with his deadly burst damage and crowd control. Pyke's passive ability, Gift of the Drowned Ones, allows him to regenerate health when he is unseen by enemies, making him a formidable opponent in skirmishes and team fights.

Pyke's strengths lie in his ability to quickly eliminate squishy targets and provide utility for his team. His Q ability, Bone Skewer, allows him to hook enemies and stun them, setting up kills for his allies. His E ability, Phantom Undertow, allows him to dash through enemies, leaving behind a trail of ghostly shadows that slow and damage enemies. Pyke's ultimate ability, Death from Below, is an execute ability that deals massive damage to enemies below a certain health threshold, resetting if it kills the target.

However, Pyke also has weaknesses that players must be aware of. He is relatively squishy and lacks sustained damage, making him vulnerable to champions with high burst damage or crowd control. Additionally, Pyke's abilities require precise timing and positioning to be effective, making him a high skill-cap champion that may take some time to master.

Overall, Pyke's

skin offers players a chance to embody the dark and vengeful nature of this champion.
